definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives

sentences.english: However, in my dream, Jabes had a full and attentive congregation ;
sentences.chinese: 但是，在我的梦里，杰别斯有专心听讲的满会堂会众。

sentences.english: He obtained, however, the recognition and approbation of the congregation of Albi.
sentences.chinese: 他得到了，但是，承认和赞许的会众的阿尔比。

sentences.english: The saint dinner table substituted for the sacrificial altar, choir's position has been ordinary is meeting audiences' right hand side.
sentences.chinese: 圣餐桌取代了祭坛，唱诗班的位置一般在会众的右首。

sentences.english: A congregation in Vorkuta gathers to celebrate Easter at a midnight Mass.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔库塔会众在午夜弥撒上团聚，庆祝复活节。

sentences.english: Senior Pastor, George Tiong, leading the congregation in prayer.
sentences.chinese: 主任牧师，张明兴牧师带领会众祷告。

sentences.english: Cpl. Erica LI and LCpl. Mandy TSE leaded the congregation to sing.
sentences.chinese: 李乐桦小队长及谢敏德见习小队长带领会众唱歌。

sentences.english: The priest always preaches on grace to a large congregation.
sentences.chinese: 牧师经常向广大会众讲关于恩典的道理。

sentences.english: This group is already a congregation of a Russian church during a ritual ice-cold water bathing.
sentences.chinese: 这是在冰水浴仪式中，一座俄罗斯教堂里的会众集会。

sentences.english: 15am - 9.45am : The general congregation will arrive at the Great North Door of Westminster Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 教堂会众抵达威斯敏斯特教堂北门。

sentences.english: the assembly must judge between him and the avenger of blood according to these regulations.
sentences.chinese: 会众就要照典章，在打死人的和报血仇的中间审判。

sentences.english: They stayed in their hammocks until the congregation had dispersed.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直在吊床上待着，等教堂里的会众解散。

sentences.english: The organist was playing the congregation out.
sentences.chinese: 弹风琴的弹着风琴把会众送了出去。

sentences.english: Supermarkets may be temples of worship for the members of the congregation.
sentences.chinese: 超级市场对会众成员来说可能是崇拜的圣殿。

sentences.english: Bells tolled the congregation to church.
I will chasten them according to the report given to their assembly.
sentences.chinese: 我必按他们会众所听见的，管教他们。

sentences.english: God and the congregation before the sun.

definition: God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
